metadata.title: CVE-2024-53149 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: typec: ucsi: glink: fix off-by-one in connector_statusUCSI connector's indices start from 1 up to 3, PMIC_GLINK_MAX_PORTS.Correct the condition in the pmic_glink_ucsi_connector_status()callback, fixing Type-C orientation reporting for the third USB-Cconnector.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
